briefTitle: SKB264 Injection vs Investigator Selected Regimens to Treat Locally Advanced, Recurrent or Metastatic Triple-negative Breast Cancer
officialTitle: A Randomized, Controlled, Open-label, Multi-center Phase III Clinical Trial of SKB264 for Injection Versus Investigator Selected Regimens in Patients With Unresectable Locally Advanced, Recurrent or Metastatic Triple-negative Breast Cancer Who Have Failed Second-line or Above Prior Standard of Care
